overview: The Insecurities Of Dill is short film about hopes, doubts, and crumpets.  Dill is being used, and he knows it. After a morning of "passion" Dill's suspicions that the woman he was made for is seeing someone else begin to bear fruit. Battling his insecurities, he decides to deal with them in the only way he knows how; by pondering politely.  Who said being the object of someone's desire would be easy?
tagline: The Little Film With a Lot of Buzz...
title: The Insecurities of Dill
